trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> class encapsulates a node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy that is returned during a search through <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher" />.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> incapsula un nodo nella gerarchia dei Servizi di dominio Active Directory restituito durante una ricerca tramite <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> class are very similar to instances of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: Le istanze del <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> sono molto simili alle istanze della classe <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> classe.

trans-unit.source: The crucial difference is that the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class retrieves its information from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy each time a new object is accessed, whereas the data for <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> is already available in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>, where it gets returned from a query that is performed with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> class.
trans-unit.target: La differenza fondamentale è che il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> classe recupera le informazioni dalla gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory ogni volta che un nuovo oggetto si accede, mentre i dati per <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> è già disponibile nel <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>, in cui Ottiene restituito da una query eseguita con la <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> classe.

trans-unit.source: Only those properties that are specified through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection in your query will be available from <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: Solo le proprietà che vengono specificate tramite il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> saranno disponibile dalla raccolta nella query <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente crea un nuovo <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> oggetto con il percorso desiderato e utilizza il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> per avviare la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver eseguito la ricerca, nell'esempio viene utilizzato il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> metodo per recuperare la voce di directory attiva identificata nei risultati della ricerca.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Recupera dalla gerarchia dei Servizi di dominio Active Directory la classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> che corrisponde alla classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> che corrisponde a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> when you want to look at the live entry instead of the entry that was returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>, or when you want to invoke a method on the object that was returned.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> quando si desidera esaminare la voce in tempo reale anziché la voce restituita tramite <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>, o quando si desidera richiamare un metodo per l'oggetto restituito.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> on each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> can be slow.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> in ogni <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> restituiti tramite <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> può richiedere molto tempo.

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the example in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente è una porzione di un esempio <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.

trans-unit.source: The original example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo esempio originale <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> oggetto con il percorso desiderato e utilizza il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> per avviare la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver eseguito la ricerca, nell'esempio viene utilizzato il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> metodo per recuperare la voce di directory in tempo reale che viene identificata nei risultati della ricerca.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il percorso per <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.

trans-unit.source: The path of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.
trans-unit.target: Percorso di <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A> property uniquely identifies this entry in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A> proprietà identifica in modo univoco questa voce nella gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The entry can always be retrieved using this path.
trans-unit.target: La voce può sempre essere recuperata utilizzando questo percorso.

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the example in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente è una porzione di un esempio <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.

trans-unit.source: The original example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo esempio originale <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> oggetto con il percorso desiderato e utilizza il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> per avviare la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver eseguito la ricerca, nell'esempio viene utilizzato il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> metodo per recuperare la voce di directory in tempo reale che viene identificata nei risultati della ricerca.

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to parse the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A> property from the search result.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio viene illustrato come analizzare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A> proprietà dai risultati della ricerca.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> collection of properties for this object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un insieme <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> di proprietà per questo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> of properties set on this object.
trans-unit.target: Insieme <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> di proprietà impostate per l'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This collection only contains properties that were explicitly requested through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Questa raccolta contiene solo le proprietà che sono stati richiesti in modo esplicito tramite <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the example in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente è una porzione di un esempio <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.

trans-unit.source: The original example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo esempio originale <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> oggetto con il percorso desiderato e utilizza il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> per avviare la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver eseguito la ricerca, nell'esempio viene utilizzato il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> metodo per recuperare la voce di directory in tempo reale che viene identificata nei risultati della ricerca.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the search result is put into a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection>.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio, il risultato della ricerca viene inserito un <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Then, each property is displayed to the console window.
trans-unit.target: Quindi, ogni proprietà viene visualizzata la finestra della console.
